game.name: 9 Kings
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 빠른 속도의 로그라이크 왕국 건설 게임. 제국을 키우고 강력한 경쟁 왕국과 대규모 전투를 벌이세요. 수천 개 광란의 건물로 게임을 깨고 왕중왕이 되세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast-paced roguelike kingdom builder. Grow your empire and fight massive battles against powerful rival kings. Break the game with thousands of insane builds to become the King of Kings.

reviewHighlights.text: I just want to say thank you to the people who created this game. It's been a few years since I have found a new game that I was heavily addicted to....
The balance is terrible in this game, I want to like it but holy shit is the balance bad. It's really highlighted in the quest game mode, it's some of...
